subject: information for haptic
description_text:
Hello, I just bought a Pro X pedal set, with the new USB interface
that allows the addition of a haptic motor. I would like to know if
this model: https://www.simsonn.com/fr/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053467962
is compatible and comes with the clamp for attaching it to the pedals.

Thank you in advance.
